entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one whose free evenings are being checked by someone else. He groans in response.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is attempting to burst a pod in the bowl and gets angry when he finds out it's another party for Slughorn's favourites.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn is mentioned as having favourites who are invited to his parties. The Slug Club is named after him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione explains that the name 'Slug Club' was not made up by her and mentions that they're allowed to bring guests.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as an example of someone who would sneer at the name 'Slug Club'.

entities.name: mclaggen
entities.description: McLaggen is suggested by Ron as a potential partner for Hermione to get with.

entities.name: professor sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout's hat gets knocked off her head by the pod.

relationships.description: Someone else is checking Harry's free evenings so they can plan a party.
Ron is trying to burst the pod in the bowl.
Hermione mentions that they're allowed to bring guests to the Slug Club party.
